segments.text: Good morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I want to deposit a sum of money into my account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ! How much do you want to deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want to deposit 2,000 yuan into my account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please fill in a deposit form first ? Please write down your name , your account number and the amount you want to put in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I wonder about the rate of interest of the account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Interest is paid at the rate of 1 % per annum at present . And it is added to your account every year .
segments.speaker: S1
